'''2.3.451''' is an update to the [[Minecraft Launcher|launcher]] released on October 13, 2022.

== Changes ==

* A hotfix release with quality of life improvements & bug fixes in anticipation of Minecraft Live this Saturday. Get ready to vote for your favorite mob!
